General.Name: Oceanwide Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. plans, designs, invests in, develops, constructs, operates, and manages real estate properties in China and internationally. It also engages in the finance business, such as securities, trust, insurance, internet finance, and futures; investment; and energy businesses. The company was formerly known as Oceanwide Real Estate Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. in April 2014. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Beijing, China. Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Oceanwide Holdings Group Company Limited.
General.Address: Tower C, Minsheng Financial Center, Beijing, China, 100005
